info.title: GEAR API Documentation
info.description:
A definition is one of the following:
  
    Capabilities
    Data Flow
    FISMA
    Investments
    IT Standards
    Organizations
    Point of Contacts
    Records
    Systems
    System Time
    Website Service Categories
    Websites

Expand each category and click on "Try it out!"

get.description: Returns the complete lit of data flow entries for all GSA Business Systems
Returns the Business Systems that interface with the Business System identified by {id}

get.summary: Find Capability by ID and list related Organizations
get.description: Returns the Organizations that are related to the Business Capability identified by {id}

get.summary: Find organization record by ID and list related Capabilities
get.description: Returns the Capabilities that are related to the Organization identified by {id}

get.summary: Find POC by ID
get.description: Returns one POC identified by {id}

get.summary: List of all Capabilities
get.description: Returns the complete list of GSA's Business Capabilities

get.summary: Find Capability by ID
get.description: Returns one Business Capability indecated by {id}

get.summary: Find Capability ID and list related Systems
get.description: Returns the Business Systems that are related to the Business Capability identified by {id}

get.summary: Find Capability by name
get.description: Returns one Business Capability indecated by {name}

get.summary: List of all FISMA systems
get.description: Returns the list of GSA's FISMA Systems, excluding inactive systems

get.summary: List of all retired FISMA Systems
get.description: Returns the list of inactive FISMA Systems

get.summary: Find FISMA System by ID
get.description: Returns one FISMA System identified by {id}

get.summary: List of all Investments
get.description: Returns the complete list of GSA's IT Investments, as tracked in GEAR

get.summary: Find record Investment ID
get.description: Returns one IT Investment identified by {id}

get.summary: Find Investment by ID and list related Systems
get.description: Returns the Business Systems that are related to the IT Investment identified by {id}

get.summary: List of all IT Standards (that have been submitted to the Software Review Request process)
get.description: Returns the entire list of GSA's Software IT Standards (except software that was not yet submitted to the Software Review Request process)

get.summary: List of all IT Standards (inluding software titles that have not yet been submitted for review)
get.description: Returns the entire list of GSA's Software IT Standards (including software that was not yet submitted to the Software Review Request process)

get.summary: Find IT standard by ID
get.description: Returns one IT Standard identified by {id}

get.summary: Find IT standard by ID and list related Systems
get.description: Returns the Business Systems and Business System metadata associated to the indicated IT Standard {id}

get.summary: List of all IT Standards types
get.description: Returns the entire list of GSA’s Software IT Standards types

get.summary: List of all IT Standards statuses
get.description: Returns the entire list of GSA’s Software IT Standards statuses

get.summary: List of all IT Standards Categories
get.description: Returns the entire list of GSA’s Software IT Standards categories

get.summary: List of all IT Standards 508 compliances
get.description: Returns the entire list of GSA’s Software IT Standards 508 compliances

get.summary: Most recently added IT Standards
get.description: Returns the most recently created IT standard item

get.summary: List of all IT Standards deployment types
get.description: Returns the list of possible IT standards deployment types

get.summary: List of all Organizations
get.description: Returns the complete list of GSA's Organizations, as they are tracked in GEAR

get.summary: Find organization record by ID
get.description: Returns one Organization identified by {id}

get.summary: Find organization record by Name and list related Systems
get.description: Returns the Business Systems that are related to the Organization identified by {name}

get.summary: List of all POCs
get.description: Returns the list of all POCs tracked in GEAR

get.summary: List of all OAS Records
get.description: Returns the entire list of OAS Records

get.summary: Find OAS Record by ID
get.description: Returns one OAS Record by {id}

get.summary: Find OAS Record by ID and list related Systems
get.description: Returns the Systems that are related to the OAS Record identified by {id}

200.description: This will display the array of systems associated with a record

get.summary: List of all Systems
get.description: Returns the complete list of GSA Business Systems, to include retired applications

get.summary: Find System by ID
get.description: Returns one Business System by {id}

get.summary: Find System by ID and list related TIME Analysis
get.description: Returns all entries for TIME analysis related to the System identified by {id}

get.summary: Find System by ID and list related Technologies
get.description: Returns the IT Standards and IT Standards metadata associated to the indicated Business System {id}

get.summary: Find System by ID and list related OAS Records
get.description: Returns the OAS Records that are related to the System identified by {id}

get.summary: Find System by ID and list related Investments
get.description: Returns the investments associated to the indicated Business System {id}

get.summary: Find System by ID and list related Capabilities
get.description: Returns the Business Capabilites and Business Capability metadata associated to the indicated Business System {id}

get.summary: List of all entries for TIME Analysis
get.description: Returns all entries for TIME analysis of all Active GSA Business Systems

get.summary: List of all Website Service Categories
get.description: Returns the complete list of Website Service Categories

get.summary: Find Website Service Category by ID
get.description: Returns one Website Service Category by {id}

get.summary: Find Category by ID and list related Websites
get.description: Returns the Websites that are related to the Website Service Category identified by {id}

get.summary: List of all Websites
get.description: Returns the complete list of GSA Websites

get.summary: Find Website by ID
get.description: Returns one GSA Website by {id}

get.summary: Find Website by ID and list related Scans
get.description: Returns the Scans that are related to the Website identified by {id}

get.summary: Find a Scan related to Website using IDs
get.description: Returns the Scans indicated by {ScanId}

get.summary: Find Website by ID and list related Service Categories
get.description: Returns the Service Categories that are related to the Website identified by {id}

get.summary: Find Website by ID and list related Systems
get.description: Returns the Systems that are related to the Website identified by {id}

The database key that identifies the FISMA System.

BusOrg.description: The short name of the organization that is related to this FISMA System.

Name.description: Is this FISMA System related to a Federal or Contractor location.

DisplayName.description: The FIPS 199 impact level of the FISMA System. One of the following values: High, Moderate, or Low.

FIPS_Impact_Level.description: Type of ATO that certifies this FISMA System.

ATODate.description: Date when the ATO needs to be renewed.

ATOType.description: Letters and other artifacts related to this FISMA System. This will be returned as an array containing zero, one, or many Artifacts, containing the NAME of the Artifact and ReferenceDocuments, which will be the URL of the Artifact.

RenewalDate.description: A shortened identifier for FISMA Systems for uses with Security's Continuous Monitoring System.

CloudYN.description: Authorizing Official for this FISMA System.

CSP.description: Program Manager for this FISMA System.

ServiceType.description: Program Manager for this FISMA System.

InactiveDate.description: Program Manager for this FISMA System.

Description.description: Program Manager for this FISMA System.

Description.description: How this IT Investment is characterized. Values are Major IT Investment, Non-Major Investment, or Funding Transfer Investment

Cloud_Alt.description: The Secondary Service Area of this IT Investment. This is a secondary Business Capability that this investment may support.

Comments.description: The Point of Contact for this IT Investment.
